Package ohos.agp.components

Class BaseItemProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.BaseItemProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecycleItemProvider

    public abstract class BaseItemProvider
extends Object
    Provides a BaseItemProvider object to associate an ComponentProvider item with the fundamental data of the component.

    A provider provides access to data items and creates a Component for each item in the dataset. When the content in a dataset changes, the subscriber is notified to respond to the changes, and the updated content is refreshed on the screen synchronously.

    Since:
    3

      • getComponent

        public abstract Component getComponent​(int position,
                                       Component convertComponent,
                                       ComponentContainer parent)
        Obtains a component that displays data in a specified position in the data set.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component in the data set.
        convertComponent - Indicates the previous component to be reused. This parameter can be null if there is no such component.
        parent - Indicates the parent component matching the component to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Returns the component matching the data item in the specified position.

      • getItemComponentType

        public int getItemComponentType​(int position)
        Obtains the component type of a data item in a dataset based on the position.

        Each time a component layout is added to the dataset, a component type must be added to match the component layout. The component type value ranges from 0 to the result of getComponentTypeCount() minus 1. For example, a component layout containing one key matches the component type value 0, and a component layout containing two keys matches the component type value 1.

        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component item in the provider dataset.
        Returns:
        Returns the component type.

      • getComponentTypeCount

        public int getComponentTypeCount​()
        Obtains the number of component types of all items in a dataset. By default, the number of component types is 1.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of component types of all items in the dataset.

      • notifyDataChanged

        public void notifyDataChanged​()
        Refreshes the component of an updated data item.

        Each registered subscriber is notified using the DataSetPublisher#notifyChanged() method.

        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataInvalidated

        public void notifyDataInvalidated​()
        Called when a provider data is invalid.

        Each registered subscriber is notified using the DataSetPublisher#informInvalidated() method.

        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataSetItemChanged

        public void notifyDataSetItemChanged​(int position)
        Refreshes the component of an updated data item.

        Each registered subscriber is notified using the DataSetPublisher#notifyItemChanged(int) method.

        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the item in the data set.
        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataSetItemInserted

        public void notifyDataSetItemInserted​(int position)
        Refreshes the component for which a specified data item has changed.

        To notify data change subscribers, call DataSetPublisher#notifyItemChanged(int).

        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the changed data item in the data set.
        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataSetItemRemoved

        public void notifyDataSetItemRemoved​(int position)
        Refreshes the component from which a specified data item has been removed.

        To notify data change subscribers, call DataSetPublisher#notifyItemRemoved(int).

        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the removed data item in the data set.
        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataSetItemRangeChanged

        public void notifyDataSetItemRangeChanged​(int startPos,
                                          int countItems)
        Refreshes the component for which a specified number of data items starting from the given position have changed.

        To notify data change subscribers, call DataSetPublisher#notifyItemRangeChanged(int, int).

        Parameters:
        startPos - Indicates the position of the first data item that has changed.
        countItems - Indicates the number of data items that have changed.
        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataSetItemRangeInserted

                                           int countItems)
        Refreshes the component for which a specified number of data items starting from the given position have been inserted.

        To notify data change subscribers, call DataSetPublisher#notifyItemRangeInserted(int, int).

        Parameters:

        countItems - Indicates the number of data items that have been inserted.
        Since:
        4
